product_name: Columbia TechMatic Printed Fleece Jacket - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The colorful Columbia TechMatic(TM) Printed Fleece jacket is sure to become essential to your tot's winter wardrobe. Use it as a mid layer under a rain shell or as an outer layer on dry days. Omni-Wick(TM) fabric wicks moisture away from the skin to keep him dry and comfortable. Extended collar on the Columbia TechMatic Printed Fleece jacket adds warmth while a full-length zipper allows for ventilation. Front hand pockets.
short_description: The colorful Columbia TechMatic(TM) Printed Fleece jacket is sure to become essential to your tot's winter wardrobe. Use it as a mid layer under a rain shell or as an outer layer on dry days.
